title: Not getting vaccinated against Covid-19 is like driving while intoxicated, one health expert says
content:
1. Not getting vaccinated against Covid-19 is like driving while intoxicated, one health expert says  CNN

localize.title: コヴィド-19の予防接種を受けないのは、酔っ払って運転するのと同じだ、とある健康専門家は言う。
一位健康专家说，不接种Covid-19疫苗就像醉酒后开车一样
一位健康專家說，不接種Covid-19疫苗就像醉酒後開車一樣
